document.author: JulSa_
document.text: Voici la mise à jour du PlayStation Store du 13 Juillet 2011. Et cette semaine on peut remarquer l’arrivé du pack Escalation pour Call of Duty Black Ops sur PS3. Moults autres joyeusetés sont disponibles avec bien sûr plusieurs réductions, des démos, des jeux complets, des vidéos, fonds d’écrans, avatars, etc. PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Essai et déblocage ( PS3 ) Dead Nation (12.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 minis (PS3 et PSP ) Arcade Pool & Snooker (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Awesome Summer Minis Bundle (5.99 €) A Space Shooter for 2 Bucks! Young Thor Widget Odyssey 1 and 2 Zombie Tycoon Ce pack contient les jeux suivants: Rating: PEGI 12 Gamocracy One : Legend Of Robot (5.19 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Démos (PS3) PixelJunk Shooter 2 Rating: PEGI 7 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) DanceDanceRevolution: New Moves DDR Supernova 2 Greatest Hits (3.59 €) Rating: PEGI 12 DIRT 3 Mud And Guts Car Pack (5.49 €) (Contient les contenus suivants disponibles à l’unité) Citroen C4 Rallycross (1.59 €) Ford Mustang Gt (1.59 €) Lancia Stratos (1.59 €) Peugeot 205 T16 Evo 2 (1.59 €) Saturn Sky (1.59 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Hyperdimension Neptunia Red Events (3.99 €) 5Pb Events (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 LA Noire « Reefer Madness » Vice Case (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 LittleBigPlanet 2 Final Fantasy Costume Pack (5.99 €) (Contient les contenus suivants disponibles à l’unité) Sephiroth Costume (1.99 €) Cloud Costume (1.99 €) Tifa Costume (1.99 €) Aerith Costume (1.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 Michael Jackson: The Experience Another Part Of Me (2.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 ModNation Racers Gladiator Props Pack (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 MotorStorm Apocalpyse The Rock Livery Pack (gratuit) Dynamo: Queen of Hearts Event Pack (gratuit) Rating: PEGI 16 Rock Band 2 Andromeda – Bluefusion (0.79 €) Another Step – Andromeda (1.49 €) Country Song – Seether (1.49 €) Queen Bee – Tina Guo (1.49 €) The Final Episode (Let’S Change The Channel) – Asking Alexandra (1.49 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Disponibilité: non disponible au Luxembourg Rock Band 3 A Little Respect – Erasure (1.49 €) Boom – P.O.D. (1.49 €) Relax (Come Fighting) – Frankie Goes to Hollywood (1.49 €) Youth Of The Nation – P.O.D. (1.49 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Disponibilité: non disponible au Luxembourg Yoostar 2 Vegas Happens Fast (gratuit) Reverse Bear Trap (1.75 €) Three Stooges (5.49 €) My Response Would Be ‘Go To Hell’ (1.75 €) Terminators: Part Man, Part Machine (1.75 €) Bombs Don’t Unscrew (1.75 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Disponibilité: non disponible en Belgique Avatars (PS3) Under Siege Asgeir Eirik Gunnar Kari Puhi Tous disponibles à 0.25 € l’unité Thèmes dynamique (PS3) Disruptive Themes Brain Freeze (1.99 €) Lama Themes Fire Inferno Theme (1.99 €) Maiden’s Tower Of Istanbul Theme (1.99 €) Meditating Woman Theme (1.99 €) Pantheon Theme (1.99 €) Waitomo’s Secret Theme (1.99 €) SMobile Themes Acr Theme (1.59 €) Ak Theme (1.59 €) Gun Theme (1.59 €) Horror Skulls Theme (1.59 €) M4 Theme (1.59 €) Mini Uzi Theme (1.59 €) KillZone 3 Guard Dynamic Theme (1.99 €) Hatch Dynamic Theme (1.99 €) The Studio Logo Static Theme By Richard Wood (1.99 €) Cosmic Pencil Dynamic Theme by Cody Hudson (1.99 €) Buddhas Static Theme by Hydro (1.99 €) Vidéos (PS3) Air Conflicts: Secret Wars Driver San Francisco – E3 Trailer NeverDead E3 2011 Trailer
